mapper.insert: insert into OemBase (OemId, MealId, TempId, "Domain", CompanylName, Phone, ExpiryTime, TotalUsersCount, TotalTaskCount, OemLevel, ParentOemId, "Status", MealStatus) values (#{oemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mealid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companylname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expirytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totaluserscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totaltaskcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oemlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentoemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mealstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update OemBase set MealId = #{mealid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TempId = #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "Domain" = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CompanylName = #{companylname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ExpiryTime = #{expirytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TotalUsersCount = #{totaluserscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TotalTaskCount = #{totaltaskcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OemLevel = #{oemlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ParentOemId = #{parentoemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "Status" = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MealStatus = #{mealstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where OemId = #{oemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select OemId, MealId, TempId, "Domain", CompanylName, Phone, ExpiryTime, TotalUsersCount, TotalTaskCount, OemLevel, ParentOemId, "Status", MealStatus from OemBase where OemId = #{oemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
